name: Class Rush: Endless Runner Fun
description:
From the creators of the world-renowned YouTube web series Titan Academy, Titan Studios Production presents School Rush. A fun casual game where there are many T1T5 characters for you to select from and get to class before it's too late!

Challenge yourself and your friends to beat the clock to be the fastest student to reach school. Work your way up from Kevin to collect gems while rushing to school, and unlock the fastest student JianHao who is the star student in Titan Academy.

Features:
- Simple swipe controls!
- Collect crazy power-ups to help you before you're late!
- 14 characters from Titan Academy with different stats to unlock!
- Collect gems along the way to help you unlock new characters!
